name: Sunrise
description: Licensed Sunrise electricians providing expert residential and commercial electrical services. From Sawgrass Mills commercial support to residential panel upgrades, Solomon Electric is your trusted local choice.

challenges.title: Major Commercial Power Support
challenges.description: Supporting one of the largest malls in the country requires electricians who understand high-capacity retail and commercial electrical needs and emergency response.

challenges.title: Aging Suburban Wiring
challenges.description: Homes built during Sunrise's original growth periods may have outdated panels or Federal Pacific breakers that need professional replacement for safety.

challenges.title: Severe Weather Readiness
challenges.description: Sunrise's central location makes it a target for summer storm surges. We prioritize whole-home surge protection to guard your property's sensitive electronics.

faqs.question: Do you offer emergency electrical repairs for Sunrise residents?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide 24/7 emergency electrical service to all Sunrise neighborhoods, including Welleby, Springtree, and the Sawgrass area.

faqs.question: Can you handle commercial electrical for Sunrise businesses?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. We serve the extensive commercial districts surrounding Sawgrass Mills and major corporate hubs with tenant build-outs, maintenance, and emergency service.

seoContent.heading: Sunrise's Trusted Licensed Electricians
seoContent.body: Sunrise is a dynamic city that serves as a cornerstone of the Broward County community. From the family-friendly parks of Welleby to the world-class shopping at Sawgrass Mills, Sunrise requires a high standard of professional electrical care. Solomon Electric is proud to be a trusted provider for our Sunrise neighbors for over 15 years.

seoContent.heading: Excellence in Electrical Care for Sunrise Families
seoContent.body: Whether you're upgrading the lighting in your Sunrise home, requiring an urgent panel replacement, or needing the peace of mind of a whole-home surge protector, our team is ready to help. We provide upfront pricing, clean workmanship, and a dedication to safety that Sunrise families can rely on.
